item.title: Google Spreadsheets: Empieza desde cero
item.description: ¿Por qué aprender Google Sheets? La forma en que usamos las hojas de cálculo está cambiando. La mayor parte de nuestro trabajo y colaboración se realiza a través de canales en línea, nuestras hojas de cálculo también se están moviendo en línea. Google Sheets es un programa de hojas de cálculo en línea que ofrece soluciones que muchas empresas necesitan en este momento. En el pasado, el principal requisito que tenían las empresas era que los profesionales tuvieran sólidos conocimientos en Microsoft Excel.

item.title: Learn Google Sheets In 1 Day With Fascinating Projects
item.description: Learn Google Sheets in a fascinating way by doing real-world, highly-applicable projects. As I walk you through every important feature of Google Sheets, I'll be showing you real-world examples of situations where you can use your new Google Sheets skills. This way the course will stay interesting and move along more quickly. Our first example will be for how to manage your SEO marketing by tracking progress in a spreadsheet.

item.title: Google Data Studio Complete Beginners to Advanced Tutorial
item.description: This Google Data Studio course will help you to become a Data Visualization Expert and will enhance your skills by offering you comprehensive knowledge, and the required hands-on experience on this widely used Cloud based BI tool, by solving real-time industry-based projects. Top Reasons why you should learn Google Data Studio : Google data Studio is the #1 cloud based Free Business Intelligence tool used industry wide. The demand for BI professionals is on the rise.

item.title: The Complete Google Drive Course - Mastering Google Drive
item.description: Welcome to The Complete Google Drive Course. This course will teach you to understand how to use and become familiar with the storage and productivity component of Google Suite: Google Drive and Google Apps. Google Drive is a safe and secure online file storage service that allows for easy collaboration and sharing. It is compatible with all types of files, ranging from PDFs to images to videos. Unlike its competitors, Google Drive offers up to 15 GB of free storage and a variety of online tools.

The service also includes Google Docs, Google Slides, Google Drawings, Google Forms, Google Sites, and Google Keep. item.title: Gmail - Grundkurs für jeden Einsteiger!
item.description: In diesem Kurs lernst Du, Gmail effektiv zu nutzen, so dass auch Du produktiver wirst und eine Ordnung in Dein Postfach bekommst. Gmail ist mittlerweile eines der meistverwendeten E-Mail Programme der Welt und dennoch wenden die meisten nur grundsätzliche Funktionen an. In diesem Kurs lernst Du alle wichtigen und grundlegenden Funktionen kennen, damit auch Du mit Gmail richtig durchstarten kannst, ohne dabei wichtige Zeit zu verlieren. Wenn Du heute noch anfängst, Gmail mit samt seinen Funktionen zu nutzen, wirst Du schnell Routine bekommen und Du wirst einen super Überblick in Deinem Postfach erhalten.

Every day, you only have a limited amount of time to dedicate to everything that's happening on.

item.title: Complete Google Slides from Scratch
item.description: Google Slide is a free web-based tool offered by Google. It is an alternative to Microsoft Powerpoint. Although, it is not so powerful as Microsoft Powerpoint and it has most of the similar features that Powerpoint has and it is completely free.
